pr_title: Mention GraalVM 20.0.0 in the exception message of the version check

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                                + " Quarkus currently offers a stable support of GraalVM 19.3.1 and 20.0.0."
          
          
            
                                + " Quarkus currently supports GraalVM 19.3.1 and 20.0.0."
timeline.author: gsmet

timeline.bodyText: Please keep the out of date part as that's exactly what we test. People using 20.0.1 won't have this warning for instance.
timeline.author: gsmet

timeline.message: Mention GraalVM 20.0.0 in the exception message of the version check
Mention GraalVM 20.0.0 in the exception message of the version check
